name: supp0prc
body: |- wi(wn(wa(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c1, universe))), wceq(co(c0, csupp, c1), emptycls))

stmt.origin: mpt2ndm0(hs0, hs1, c0, universe, c1, universe, csupp, crab(hs2, cdm(cv(hs0)), wne(cima(cv(hs0), csn(cv(hs2))), csn(cv(hs1)))))
stmt.pretty: mpt2ndm0(hs0, hs1, c0, universe, c1, universe, csupp, { hs2 ∈ dom(hs0)|(hs0 " { hs2 })≠ { hs1 } })

body.origin:
|- wi(wn(wa(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c1, universe))), wceq(co(c0, csupp, c1), emptycls))
-| wceq(csupp, cmpo(hs0, hs1, universe, universe, crab(hs2, cdm(cv(hs0)), wne(cima(cv(hs0), csn(cv(hs2))), csn(cv(hs1))))))
-| diffss(hs0, hs1)
-| diffsc(hs0, universe)
-| diffsc(hs0, universe)
-| diffsc(hs1, universe)
-| diffsc(hs1, universe)
body.pretty:
⊢ (¬(c0 ∈ 𝕌 ∧ c1 ∈ 𝕌)→(c0[supp]c1)= ∅)
⊣ supp =(hs0 ∈ 𝕌, hs1 ∈ 𝕌 ↦ { hs2 ∈ dom(hs0)|(hs0 " { hs2 })≠ { hs1 } })
⊣ d(hs0, hs1)
⊣ d(hs0, 𝕌)
⊣ d(hs0, 𝕌)
⊣ d(hs1, 𝕌)
⊣ d(hs1, 𝕌)

comment: The support of a class is empty if either the class or the "zero" is a proper class. . (Contributed by AV, 28-May-2019.)
